website_summaries.verdict: The iPhone 6 Plus is a extremely large iPhone. It's an excellent device on AT&T, but the right-sized iPhone 6 makes more sense for more people.
pros: Excellent camera, especially in low light
cons: It's really big, especially if you're coming from an older iPhone

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The phone itself looked good. But everything else was broken! The microphone was broken, you can’t hear anything during the phone call. Camera quality was okey, but while taking a vid/photo the picture would shake, so you can’t see what you taking a picture of. Siri doesn’t work - we tried everything to set it up, but that was one of the additions to a broken microphone. Proximity reader didn’t work. We didn’t have any issues while returning it. Got our refund quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: So far phone is great. Arrived on time despite fed ex giving later date. Externally phone is in perfect condition. Didn’t find one scratch. Everything works as it should, only complaint is device runs a little slower than it should. I would purchase from this seller again. Definitely worth the good price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly T

customer_reviews.title: The Iphone plus was in perfect cosmetic condition and works great
customer_reviews.text: The company did exactly what they promised. The Iphone plus was in perfect cosmetic condition and works great! My teenagers are very happy girls. You would never know that they were not purchased new. Highly recommend this company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful appearance
customer_reviews.text: The screen is big enough,the quality is good,it doesn't lag
customer_reviews.author: JIA Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check your software first
customer_reviews.text: Quality of the hardware of product fine but software was as if it has been f***** around with and then thrown off on someone else to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Wallace

customer_reviews.title: IPhone 6 Plus used
customer_reviews.text: So far I am very pleased with this phone. Good price. Attractive. Time will tell. Can not confirm the durability of the glass used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THE + SIZE! Glad we did NOT get the smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas E. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Was not the color in the description and it was ...
customer_reviews.text: Was not the color in the description and it was not AT&T so I had to go get it unlocked and pay for it but I guess you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: robin jones

customer_reviews.title: It's in perfect condition haven't had any problems yet it's working perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the iPhone for about 2 months now. It's in perfect condition haven't had any problems yet it's working perfectly fine.thank you guys I will be ordering another one soon 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and phone came in nearly new condition. Works with AT&T.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Phones was stuck in i-tunes app couldn't get program it was a lemon unsatisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: Hilario T. Segura

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone got it about 2 weeks ago the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this phone got it about 2 weeks ago the only problem when I got the phone I noticed the screen popping up thought it was the screen but when I brought it to a repair shop they told me it wasn't the screen it was the battery that wasn't good anymore so I had to end up paying $60.00 for a new battery
customer_reviews.author: Melody M Cullivan

customer_reviews.title: Really best thing I ever purchased from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Way better and bigger than my old phone. Plus a lot more fancy too. Like all the new features on the 6 plus also love my new Lifeproof case I bought too
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Carriere

customer_reviews.title: Touch disease
customer_reviews.text: I bought this phone for my granddaughter and when I set the phone up I discovered it had what is know as “Touch Disease” which wasn’t disclosed in anyway in the description. VERY Disappointed with the seller. I checked local phone repair shops which told me it would cost about $150 to repair. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Donna L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for us
customer_reviews.text: Took it to AT&T. Put in a SIM card and it has worked great since way better than paying 1000 dollars from AT&T
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!! Seller gave personal info for any help ...
customer_reviews.text: Came earlier than expected! Looks great!! Seller gave personal info for any help I might need... Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Distler

customer_reviews.title: Loving my iPhone 6 plus
customer_reviews.text: Phone is working properly and I'm loving it! It's kinda big big but I'm use to it now!!!
customer_reviews.author: ANIKA M GUIDRY

customer_reviews.title: It is in great condition and I have had it for a couple ...
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because of the decent price it would have some sort of problems. NONE! It is in great condition and I have had it for a couple weeks now with absolutely no problems.
customer_reviews.author: david romas

customer_reviews.title: It's a great phone and looks great but very upset that something ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a great phone and looks great but very upset that something is wrong with the speaker when I talk or call someone it's even worse when I use FaceTime bummer I spent so much for a phone that I can't hear out of.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Turnage
